Parse htlm page from Scopus to retrieve the abstract of a document

get_scopusAbstract.Rd

Parse htlm page from Scopus to retrieve the abstract of a document

get_scopusAbstract(urlScopus)

Arguments

urlScopus

URL of a document

Value

Text of the abstract of the document

Contents

Developed by Hervé Guillon, Alyssa DeVincentis, Noelle Patterson, Romina Diaz Gomez, Arthur Koehl.

Site built with pkgdown 1.5.1.
